title: May's story
creator_credit: Sue Freeth, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: In 1895, at the age of 24, May sailed to Japan and dedicated her life to caring for the children in the villages. Sue Freeth, with the help of some of May’s ex-students, traces the path walked by May, and in doing so comes closer to understanding the life of this amazing woman.
creator_credit_for_label: Sue Freeth, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

Sue Freeth, with the help of some of May’s ex-students, traces the path walked by May, and in doing so comes closer to understanding the life of this amazing woman.
